question_text: A technician needs to install drivers for a multifunction printer across several departments using different versions of Windows. Which two actions are necessary to ensure compatibility and functionality? (Select two)
answer_options: Use a universal print driver regardless of OS
Download and install both 32-bit and 64-bit versions of the driver
Match the driver to the printer’s MAC address
Verify driver version compatibility with the Windows OS
correct_answer: Download and install both 32-bit and 64-bit versions of the driver
Verify driver version compatibility with the Windows OS
explanation: Matching driver architecture and confirming OS compatibility are critical for consistent feature support across multiple systems.
